about_the_game:
The Overload soundtrack contains over an hour of original music composed specifically for the game. It features tracks from six musicians, including veterans of the classic Descent series. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping experience that will take you to the outer moons and back. Prepare for Overload!

Track List


Disc 1
Act I
1. Hostility (5:22)
2. Survival (4:44)
3. Exile (6:33)
4. Refinement (5:12)
5. Complexity (5:30)
6. Goliath (2:40)

Act II
7. Darkness Eternal (4:36)
8. Europa (7:51)
9. Regrowth (8:20)
10. Really Cold Pain (4:36)
11. Meddler (5:24)
12. Taurus (3:59)
13. Tetrahedron (6:16)
14. Enhancement (6:55)

Disc 2
Act III
1. Plus Ultra (6:00)
2. Unmanned (6:30)
3. Far Flung (7:45)
4. Spiral Tide (5:06)
5. Discovery (5:33)
6. Hidden Grind (3:03)

Extras
7. Prepare For Overload (2:28)
8. Simulator (1:58)
9. Aggression (3:04)
10. Tunnel (1:34)
11. Decompression (1:27)
12. Failure (2:40)
13. Beale (1:35)
14. Trinidad (1:25)
15. Revival (1:21)
16. Approach (1:49)
17. Evacuation (0:22)
18. Level Up (6:44)

Total runtime 2:32:54
